department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
description: Canada is seeking offers to provide vertical blinds to the Department of National Defence. The contractor must supply and install 415 PVC vertical blinds, including labour and material, and remove and dispose of existing window treatments.
full_summary:
# W0100-233998 Government Tender Announcement
### DND Vertical Blinds Installation
==============================================

#### Tender Details
-------------------

*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive Bidding
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services

#### Solicitation Information
---------------------------

*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4223021308
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-10-19
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-09T14:00:00

#### Contract Information
------------------------

*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
*   **End User Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

#### Goods and Services
---------------------

*   **Goods and Services Provided**: Supply and installation of vertical blinds (208 left draw and 207 right draw 60” x 64” PVC curved), removal and disposal of existing window treatments
*   **Period of Contract**: Date of Contract to March 31, 2024
*   **Location**: Halifax

#### Bidding Information
----------------------

*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Contact Person**: Walsh, Heather (SPAC/PSPC) (she/her)
*   **Contact Person Email**: heather.walsh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Additional Information
------------------------

*   **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17768372?extsite=MTc3NjgzNzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
*   **Tender Description**: The Government of Canada is seeking offers from offerors to provide vertical blinds, including the supply and installation of vertical blinds and removal of existing window treatments.
*   **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
*   **Canadian Content Policy**: Conditional
